languages.text: "Следы смерти подобны открытой книге для посвященного в Завет. Умелый ткач может отправиться в шахты и поведать, что принесло гибель каторжанам".
"The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."
languages.original_text: "Следы смерти подобны открытой книге для посвященного в Завет. Умелый ткач может отправиться в шахты и поведать, что принесло гибель каторжанам".

traits.locale_text: "The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of Ann'shini. A skilled weaver can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."
"The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of Ann'shini. A skilled weaver can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."
"The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Way. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."
"The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Way. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."
"The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."
"The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."

languages.text: "Die Spuren des Todes sind für einen Schüler des Netzes ein offenes Buch. Ein geschickter Spinner kann in die Minen gehen und in Erfahrung bringen, was die Häftlinge getötet hat."
languages.original_text: "The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."

traits.locale_text: "Die Spuren des Todes sind für einen Schüler des Netzes ein offenes Buch. Ein geschickter Spinner kann in die Minen gehen und in Erfahrung bringen, was die Häftlinge getötet hat."

languages.text: « Les disciples de la Toile lisent dans les traces de la mort comme dans un livre ouvert. Un tisseur expérimenté pourrait se rendre dans les mines afin de découvrir de quoi sont morts les condamnés. »
languages.original_text: "The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."

traits.locale_text: « Les disciples de la Toile lisent dans les traces de la mort comme dans un livre ouvert. Un tisseur expérimenté pourrait se rendre dans les mines afin de découvrir de quoi sont morts les condamnés. »

languages.text: «Los restos de la muerte son un libro abierto para los discípulos de la Red. Un tejedor experto puede visitar las minas y revelar qué ha traído la muerte a los convictos».
languages.original_text: "The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."

traits.locale_text: «Los restos de la muerte son un libro abierto para los discípulos de la Red. Un tejedor experto puede visitar las minas y revelar qué ha traído la muerte a los convictos».

languages.text: 「死の痕跡は、ウェブの弟子にとっては開かれた書物のようなものだ。熟練のスピナーであれば、鉱山に行って、囚人たちに死をもたらしたのが何なのかを明らかにすることができます」
languages.original_text: "The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."

traits.locale_text: 「死の痕跡は、ウェブの弟子にとっては開かれた書物のようなものだ。熟練のスピナーであれば、鉱山に行って、囚人たちに死をもたらしたのが何なのかを明らかにすることができます」

languages.text: “对织血罗网的信徒而言，死亡的痕迹就像一本打开的书一样。我们可以派遣技艺精湛的织网者前往矿井，揭示那些犯人的死因。”
languages.original_text: "The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."

traits.locale_text: “对织血罗网的信徒而言，死亡的痕迹就像一本打开的书一样。我们可以派遣技艺精湛的织网者前往矿井，揭示那些犯人的死因。”

languages.text: "Ölümün izleri, Ağ'ın müritleri için açık kitap gibidir. Yetenekli bir dokur, madenlere gidip mahkûmları ölüme kavuşturanın ne olduğunu ortaya çıkarabilir."
languages.original_text: "The traces of death are like an open book to a disciple of the Web. A skilled spinner can go to the mines and reveal what brought death to the convicts."
